#############################################################################
# Makefile for building: reader
# Generated by qmake (1.05a) (Qt 3.1.2) on: Mon Apr 25 11:59:15 2005
# Project:  reader.pro
# Template: app
# Command: $(QMAKE) -o Makefile.txt reader.pro
#############################################################################

!if !$d(BCB)
BCB = $(MAKEDIR)\..
!endif

####### Compiler, tools and options

CC	=	bcc32
CXX	=	bcc32
LEX     = flex
YACC    = byacc
CFLAGS	=	-tWR -tWM -O2 -tWC  -RT-  -DUNICODE -DQT_THREAD_SUPPORT -DQT_NO_DEBUG
CXXFLAGS=	-tWR -tWM -O2 -tWC  -RT-  -DUNICODE -DQT_THREAD_SUPPORT -DQT_NO_DEBUG
LEXFLAGS=
YACCFLAGS=-d
INCPATH	=	 -I"$(QTDIR)\include" -I"X:\cellular\deltavision\version6" -I"$(QTDIR)\mkspecs\win32-borland"
LINK	=	ilink32
LFLAGS	=	-L$(BCB)\lib;$(QTDIR)\lib;C:\Borland\BCC55\lib\PSDK -c -x -Gn /dopengl32.dll -ap -Tpe c0x32.obj
LIBS	=	import32.lib qtmt312.lib qtmain.lib cw32mti.lib
MOC	=	$(QTDIR)\bin\moc.exe
UIC	=	$(QTDIR)\bin\uic.exe
QMAKE =       qmake
IDC		=	$(QTDIR)\bin\idc.exe
IDL		=	midl
ZIP	=	zip -r -9
DEF_FILE =	
RES_FILE =	
COPY_FILE  =       copy
COPY_DIR  =       copy
DEL_FILE   =       del
DEL_DIR    =       rmdir
MOVE  =       move
CHK_DIR_EXISTS =	if not exist
MKDIR		=	mkdir

####### Files

HEADERS =	dvReader.h \
		deltaViewer.h \
		jpgView\jpgView.h \
		opengl\glImage.h \
		distchooser\distChooser.h \
		distchooser\tabWidget.h \
		colorChooser.h
SOURCES =	dvReader.cpp \
		deltaViewer.cpp \
		jpgView\jpgView.cpp \
		opengl\glImage.cpp \
		distchooser\distChooser.cpp \
		distchooser\tabWidget.cpp \
		colorChooser.cpp \
		main.cpp
OBJECTS =	dvReader.obj \
		deltaViewer.obj \
		jpgView.obj \
		glImage.obj \
		distChooser.obj \
		tabWidget.obj \
		colorChooser.obj \
		main.obj
FORMS =	
UICDECLS =	
UICIMPLS =	
SRCMOC	=	moc_deltaViewer.cpp \
		jpgView\moc_jpgView.cpp \
		opengl\moc_glImage.cpp \
		distchooser\moc_distChooser.cpp \
		distchooser\moc_tabWidget.cpp \
		moc_colorChooser.cpp
OBJMOC	=	moc_deltaViewer.obj \
		moc_jpgView.obj \
		moc_glImage.obj \
		moc_distChooser.obj \
		moc_tabWidget.obj \
		moc_colorChooser.obj
DIST	=	
TARGET	=	reader.exe

####### Implicit rules

.SUFFIXES: .c .cpp .cc .cxx .C

.cpp.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o$@ $<

.cc.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o$@ $<

.cxx.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o$@ $<

.C.obj:
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o$@ $<

.c.obj:
	$(CC) -c $(CFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -o$@ $<

####### Build rules

all:  $(TARGET)

$(TARGET):  $(UICDECLS) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC) 
	$(LINK) @&&|
	$(LFLAGS) $(OBJECTS) $(OBJMOC),$(TARGET),,$(LIBS),$(DEF_FILE),$(RES_FILE)
|


mocables: $(SRCMOC)

Makefile.txt: reader.pro  $(QTDIR)\mkspecs\win32-borland\qmake.conf 
	$(QMAKE) -o Makefile.txt reader.pro
qmake: 
	@$(QMAKE) -o Makefile.txt reader.pro

dist:
	$(ZIP) .zip .pro $(SOURCES) $(HEADERS) $(DIST) $(FORMS)

clean:
	-del dvReader.obj
	-del deltaViewer.obj
	-del jpgView.obj
	-del glImage.obj
	-del distChooser.obj
	-del tabWidget.obj
	-del colorChooser.obj
	-del main.obj
	-del moc_deltaViewer.cpp
	-del jpgView\moc_jpgView.cpp
	-del opengl\moc_glImage.cpp
	-del distchooser\moc_distChooser.cpp
	-del distchooser\moc_tabWidget.cpp
	-del moc_colorChooser.cpp
	-del moc_deltaViewer.obj
	-del moc_jpgView.obj
	-del moc_glImage.obj
	-del moc_distChooser.obj
	-del moc_tabWidget.obj
	-del moc_colorChooser.obj
	-del reader.tds

distclean: clean
	-del $(TARGET)

####### Compile

dvReader.obj: dvReader.cpp dvReader.h

deltaViewer.obj: deltaViewer.cpp deltaViewer.h \
		dvReader.h \
		jpgView\jpgView.h \
		opengl\glImage.h \
		distchooser\distChooser.h \
		distchooser\tabWidget.h \
		colorChooser.h

jpgView.obj: jpgView\jpgView.cpp jpgView\jpgView.h
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -ojpgView.obj jpgView\jpgView.cpp

glImage.obj: opengl\glImage.cpp opengl\glImage.h
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -oglImage.obj opengl\glImage.cpp

distChooser.obj: distchooser\distChooser.cpp distchooser\distChooser.h
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -odistChooser.obj distchooser\distChooser.cpp

tabWidget.obj: distchooser\tabWidget.cpp distchooser\tabWidget.h
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -otabWidget.obj distchooser\tabWidget.cpp

colorChooser.obj: colorChooser.cpp colorChooser.h

main.obj: main.cpp dvReader.h \
		jpgView\jpgView.h \
		deltaViewer.h \
		opengl\glImage.h \
		distchooser\distChooser.h \
		distchooser\tabWidget.h \
		colorChooser.h

moc_deltaViewer.obj: moc_deltaViewer.cpp deltaViewer.h dvReader.h \
		jpgView\jpgView.h \
		opengl\glImage.h \
		distchooser\distChooser.h \
		distchooser\tabWidget.h \
		colorChooser.h

moc_jpgView.obj: jpgView\moc_jpgView.cpp jpgView\jpgView.h 
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -omoc_jpgView.obj jpgView\moc_jpgView.cpp

moc_glImage.obj: opengl\moc_glImage.cpp opengl\glImage.h 
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -omoc_glImage.obj opengl\moc_glImage.cpp

moc_distChooser.obj: distchooser\moc_distChooser.cpp distchooser\distChooser.h 
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -omoc_distChooser.obj distchooser\moc_distChooser.cpp

moc_tabWidget.obj: distchooser\moc_tabWidget.cpp distchooser\tabWidget.h 
	$(CXX) -c $(CXXFLAGS) $(INCPATH) -omoc_tabWidget.obj distchooser\moc_tabWidget.cpp

moc_colorChooser.obj: moc_colorChooser.cpp colorChooser.h 

moc_deltaViewer.cpp: $(MOC) deltaViewer.h
	$(MOC) deltaViewer.h -o moc_deltaViewer.cpp

jpgView\moc_jpgView.cpp: $(MOC) jpgView\jpgView.h
	$(MOC) jpgView\jpgView.h -o jpgView\moc_jpgView.cpp

opengl\moc_glImage.cpp: $(MOC) opengl\glImage.h
	$(MOC) opengl\glImage.h -o opengl\moc_glImage.cpp

distchooser\moc_distChooser.cpp: $(MOC) distchooser\distChooser.h
	$(MOC) distchooser\distChooser.h -o distchooser\moc_distChooser.cpp

distchooser\moc_tabWidget.cpp: $(MOC) distchooser\tabWidget.h
	$(MOC) distchooser\tabWidget.h -o distchooser\moc_tabWidget.cpp

moc_colorChooser.cpp: $(MOC) colorChooser.h
	$(MOC) colorChooser.h -o moc_colorChooser.cpp

####### Install

install: all 

uninstall:
